import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { GlobalState } from '../../../GlobalState' import Loading from '../utils/loading/Loading' const initialState = { product_id: '', title: '', price: 0, description: 'This is description', content: 'Content', category: '' } function CreateProduct() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [product, setProduct] = useState(initialState) const [categories] = state.categoriesAPI.categories const [images, setImages] = useState(false) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [isAdmin] = state.userAPI.isAdmin const handleUpload = async e => { e.preventDefault() try { if (!isAdmin) return alert("You're not an admin") const file = e.target.files[0] console.log(file) } catch (err) { alert(err.response.data.msg) } } const styleUpload = { display: images ? "block" : "none" } return (
